api_list.name: Search

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
ACCEPTED VALUES:  
album
artist
track
year
genre

api_list.name: Audio Analysis
api_list.description: Get audio analysis of any track

api_list.name: Audio Features
Album Tracks
api_list.description: Get all tracks of an specific Spotify album

api_list.name: Artist Albums
api_list.description: Fetch all albums of any Spotify artist

api_list.name: Related Artists
Get Album Info (Single)
Artist Details (Single)
User details
api_list.description: get user details of any Spotify user

api_list.name: Get user Playlists
api_list.description: Fetch all public playlists of a specific user.

api_list.name: New releases
api_list.description: Get new releases based on country code.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Enter country code like: US, CA, SE, IN, UK...

api_list.name: Get Playlist Details
api_list.description: Get playlist details like: playlist_name, description, thumbnail, likes_count, tracks_count & details of each individual songs (upto 100) like: song_name, url, artist_name, thumbnail &  duration.

api_list.name: Get Track Details (Single)
api_list.description: Get track_name, thumbnail, duration & artist_name of any Spotify Track. Album/Podcast/Show not supported.
